text:
Hmm~, when i put on the costume,
my excitement really builds up~!

Haha,
Kogane really gave it her all this time, didn't she?

Yeah!
I researched a lot of things for today~
I'm confident we'll make the stage amazing!

I wonder when the curtain will rise...
I'm excited to take the audience into our world!

The Venice Carnival is the world's greatest masquerade ball.
A world of mysterious beauty... right?
I'm looking forward to seeing how Kogane expresses it.

Hehe, I'm glad you said that~
I'll do my best to meet those expectations!

When the bell rings, I'll...
become the host of the world's greatest masquerade ball.

I'll captivate everyone's attention,
so keep your eyes on me...!
